description: If you can see this, it's probably a bug.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. It's heavy and rattles with the distinct sound of various types of ammunition.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. A low hum emanates from it, promising a trove of batteries and power cells.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. It feels cool to the touch and is surprisingly dense, suggesting advanced cybernetic contents.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. You can hear liquid sloshing around inside, a welcome sound for any thirsty survivor.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. It has a faint smell of chemicals and should probably be handled with extreme care.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. The faint aroma of preserved food wafts from its seams, offering a convenient, if unpredictable, meal.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. Heavy and solid, it almost certainly contains some form of firearm.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. It has a sterile, antiseptic smell, hinting at the medical supplies within.
A mysterious box manifested through a hefty financial transaction. A faint biohazard symbol is stenciled on the side, indicating a cargo of potent serums.
